question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding the period between the eighth and the twelfth century CE?
1. There was the absence of any effective central authority in India.
2. It is also referred to as the pre-Sultanate age.
3. It witnessed a mushrooming of innumerable kingdoms which appeared and disappeared from the scene.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The period between the eighth and the twelfth century CE saw the absence of any effective central authority in India. It is also referred to as the pre-Sultanate age. It witnessed a mushrooming of innumerable kingdoms which appeared and disappeared from the scene.
